welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sterling Heights, where you'll find a charming blend of suburban tranquility and vibrant city life. Known for its beautiful parks, diverse dining options, and friendly atmosphere, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Korea Palace
restaurants.description: Korea Palace is a korean restaurant located in Sterling Heights.

restaurants.name: Polka Restaurant And Beer Cafe

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and military flights at Selfridge ANGB Airport.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit City Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Detroit City Airport serves all domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pontiac Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pontiac Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: McNamara Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Detroit Metropolitan Wayne County Airport, primarily serving low-cost carriers and domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
